If you are reading this, you have been recognized
by the Will Council, and are invited to join them.
Your current xserver has basic functionality:
you should be able to backup, shutdown, see your IP,
and connect to your email server (not recommended nor
nessary), and access a barebones command shell. You
should also have a few tools on your system.
For complete inauguration, you must find a complete
xserver compatible with this installation.
We have set up a small series of challenges, starting
at the IP at the bottom of this message. Continue
until you find an xserver.
SERVER IP: 222.51.39.138
